l:dependency.name: Cucumber reports
l:dependency.l:description: The Jenkins Plugins Parent POM Project

l:dependency.name: OWASP Java HTML Sanitizer
l:dependency.l:description: Takes third-party HTML and produces HTML that is safe to embed in your web application. Fast and easy to configure.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: jsoup Java HTML Parser
l:dependency.l:description: jsoup is a Java library for working with real-world HTML. It provides a very convenient API for extracting and manipulating data, using the best of DOM, CSS, and jquery-like methods. jsoup implements the WHATWG HTML5 specification, and parses HTML to the same DOM as modern browsers do.

l:dependency.name: jackson-databind
l:dependency.l:description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Configuration
l:dependency.l:description: Tools to assist in the reading of configuration/preferences files in various formats.

l:dependency.name: Joda-Time
l:dependency.l:description: Date and time library to replace JDK date handling

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons IO
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters, file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

l:dependency.name: cucumber-reporting
l:dependency.l:description: Provides pretty html reports for Cucumber. It works by generating html from the cucumber json file.

l:dependency.name: Apache Velocity - Engine
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Velocity is a general purpose template engine.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Collections
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons Collections package contains types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

l:dependency.name: Plexus Common Utilities
l:dependency.l:description: A collection of various utility classes to ease working with strings, files, command lines, XML and more.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Collections
l:dependency.l:description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-core
l:dependency.l:description: Core Jackson processing abstractions (aka Streaming API), implementation for JSON

l:dependency.name: Jackson-annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Core annotations used for value types, used by Jackson data binding package.

l:dependency.name: Jackson datatype: JSR310
l:dependency.l:description: Add-on module to support JSR-310 (Java 8 Date & Time API) data types.
